Articles.Content:
I don't care what religion you are. I don't care where you live. Please pray, ask your gods, something for the people of Paris.

http://www.cnn.com/2015/11/13/world/paris-shooting/

http://www.thedailybeast.com/articles/2015/11/13/20-killed-in-multiple-paris-attacks.html

Edited November 14, 2015 by minepagan
For every act of evil, there are hundreds to thousands of acts of kindness.

Maybe its time for groundforces in Syria, to show any extremist that religios motivated violence leads to an early, inevitable death. When extremists cant display themself as "winners" anymore because they are dead such things loose their popularity quite fast.

France could envoke Article 5 of the NATO threaty and this IS thing would be over quite soon...

Maybe its time for groundforces in Syria, to show any extremist that religios motivated violence leads to an early, inevitable death. When extremists cant display themself as "winners" anymore because they are dead such things loose their popularity quite fast.

France could envoke Article 5 of the NATO threaty and this IS thing would be over quite soon...

This should've happened years ago. I say combine the defense forces of all EU and NATO countries, hunt them down and kill them all. Every single one of them. They can't hide forever. They're too dumb for that.
There is another thread about this, and since this one seems to be devolving into political debate immediately I'm closing it.
